    • Method Detail

      • isJavaFile

        public static boolean isJavaFile(File file)
        Returns true if the file is a file ending with .java

      • isJavaTestFile

        public static boolean isJavaTestFile(File file)
        Checks if the given file is a java test file not to be ignored. Returns true if it is a file and does not contain @skip-test in the declaration comment of the file.

      • shouldSucceed

        public static boolean shouldSucceed(File expectedFile)
        Returns true if the compilation associated with the given expected output should succeed without any errors. In particular, it returns true if the expected file doesn't exist, or all the found errors are warnings.

      • enclosedJavaTestFiles

        public static List<File> enclosedJavaTestFiles(File directory)
        Returns all the java files that are direct children of the given directory

      • deeplyEnclosedJavaTestFiles

        public static List<File> deeplyEnclosedJavaTestFiles(File directory)
        Returns all the java files that are descendants of the given directory

      • expectedDiagnostics

        public static List<String> expectedDiagnostics(File file)

      • expectedDiagnostics

        public static List<String> expectedDiagnostics(String prefix,
                               String[] files)

      • expectedDiagnostics

        public static List<String> expectedDiagnostics(File[] files)
